meanings.definition: relating to or involving relationships outside of marriage
meanings.sent1: She felt guilty about her extramarital affair.
meanings.sent2: It is not right to have extramarital relationships.
meanings.sent3: The extramarital gossip at work was causing quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The extramarital tension in the air was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of extramarital actions can be devastating.

meanings.definition: a sexual relationship outside of marriage
meanings.sent1: He confessed to his wife about his extramarital involvement.
meanings.sent2: Extramarital affairs can lead to trust issues.
meanings.sent3: The comedy movie had a subplot about extramarital escapades.
meanings.sent4: The novel's plot twist revealed a shocking extramarital affair.
meanings.sent5: The news of the extramarital scandal spread quickly.
